Dear Harry:
Thank you for your note that your Network Manager would
send me a list of the tape offerings within the next
few weeks* In most cases, we will probably avoid plam>-
ing to use these in our tape catalog, but if it does
seem advisable to do so, we shall certainly clear with
you.
